name: Green Thumb: Balcony Bounty
description:
Controls:

A - Look Left

D - Look Right

Q - Lean Left

E - Lean Right

Left-Click - Press Button

Description:

This is an entry for Ludum Dare 46. The theme for this jam was "Keep it alive". Models were created by https://argagaming.itch.io/

You have planted a couple of watermelon plants on your apartment balcony. 

Using your remote-controlled gardening kit, keep those melons safe for as long as you can from crows that try to eat them. 

And don't forget to water the plants!

Textures and sounds that were not custom, are under Creative Commons 0. The game was created using Unity, Blender, Krita, and Audacity.
